meanings.definition: The process of becoming liquid by absorbing moisture from the air.
meanings.sent1: After a heavy rain, the deliquescences of the salt left a wet spot on the ground.
meanings.sent2: The deliquescences of the sugar in the tea made it sweet.
meanings.sent3: The deliquescences of the ice cream caused a sticky mess on the table.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness deliquescences into the hearts of those around her.
meanings.sent5: The deliquescences of the chocolate in the sun created a gooey mess.

meanings.definition: The act of dissolving or melting into a liquid.
meanings.sent1: The deliquescences of the sugar in the water made it a sweet solution.
meanings.sent2: The deliquescences of the snow turned the landscape into a watery scene.
meanings.sent3: The deliquescences of the ice cream in the sun turned it into a puddle.
meanings.sent4: His anger deliquescences into tears as he realized his mistake.
meanings.sent5: The deliquescences of the candle wax created colorful patterns on the table.

meanings.definition: The state of being dissolved or melted into a liquid.
meanings.sent1: The deliquescences of the salt formed a salty solution in the water.
meanings.sent2: The deliquescences of the chocolate created a smooth and creamy texture.
meanings.sent3: The deliquescences of the ice cream in the heat turned it into a liquid mess.
meanings.sent4: Her love deliquescences into every aspect of her life, making it beautiful.
meanings.sent5: The deliquescences of the snow on the roof made icicles drip down.
